author: AnySoftKeyboard

changeLog:
* Minimum Android version is 4.0.3 (ICS, API level 15).
* Basic support for OS field auto-fill.
* Better vibration control for newer OS versions.
* Fixes around permission requests.
* Fixes for colorized nav-bar.
* A few small gesture-typing fixes.
* Other bug fixes.
* Updated translations from the community.

More: https://github.com/AnySoftKeyboard/AnySoftKeyboard/milestone/93

author: vector-im
name: Element
changeLog:
Changes in Element v1.6.6 (2023-10-05)
======================================

Bugfixes üêõ
----------
 - Fixed JWT token for Jitsi openidtoken-jwt authentication ([#7758](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/7758))
 - Fix crash when max shortcuts count is exceeded ([#8644](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8644))
 - Fix Login with QR code not working with rust crypto. ([#8653](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8653))

Other changes
-------------
 - Use 3PID capability to show / hide email UI in settings ([#8615](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8615))
 - If an external account manager is configured on the server, use it to delete other sessions and hide the multi session deletion. ([#8616](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8616))
 - Hide account deactivation UI for account managed externally. ([#8619](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8619))
 - Fix import of SAS Emoji string translations. ([#8623](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8623))
 - Open external account manager for delete other sessions using Chrome custom tabs. ([#8645](https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/issues/8645))




## What's Changed
* Hide setting entry point to manage 3Pid if homeserver capability `m.3pid_changes` is set to `false`. by @bmarty in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8618
* Fix SAS strings import URL by @turt2live in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8623
* Sync SAS Strings by @github-actions in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8626
* Translations update from Weblate by @RiotTranslateBot in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8625
* Fixes #7758: Fixed JWT token for Jitsi openidtoken-jwt authentication by @tomtit in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8341
* Bump org.matrix.rustcomponents:crypto-android from 0.3.10 to 0.3.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8630
* Feature/bma/OIDC session end by @bmarty in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8620
* Fix crash when max shortcuts count is exceeded by @yostyle in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8644
* Hide deactivate account section in case of account managed externally. by @bmarty in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8627
* Open OIDC account management URL in chrome tab by @hughns in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8645
* Fix QR code login support in rust by @BillCarsonFr in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8654

## New Contributors
* @tomtit made their first contribution in https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/pull/8341

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/vector-im/element-android/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6

author: TeamNewPipe
name: NewPipe
changeLog:
## :warning: Important fixes :warning:

- [YouTube] Fixed the recent issue where **videos would abort playing** because of HTTP 403 errors TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1084

  The issue happened because YouTube is removing the effectiveness of the previous workaround (i.e. using player parameters of Stories and the start of the Shorts ones) used to get streams from the Android client.

  ‚ö†Ô∏è Like for the previous workaround, the new one used (which, at the moment of publishing the release, is the only known one) to fix the issue **can break at any time**.

  As stated in the changelog of 0.24.1, if you see this error again and you have the ability to block network requests to specific domains for apps on your device, you can block the `youtubei.googleapis.com` domain to work around this issue.

  However, this has a few downsides:
  - the 720p video stream with audio (used for external players) will be not available on musical contents;
  - the 48kbps M4A audio stream and the 144p 3GPP video stream will be not available;
  - the rewind duration of livestreams will be limited to 30 seconds at most, instead of 1 hour.
- Some users reported **player crashes or black screen** on some devices, especially Android TVs. In some cases this was caused by *media tunneling* not being properly implemented by the manufacturer.
  - Such feature now is disabled by default on more known unsupported devices! #10122
  - In case you still experience similar issues, try to manually disable *media tunneling* from `Settings -> Video and audio -> ExoPlayer settings -> Disable media tunneling`, and report to us if your device needs to be blacklisted automatically. You may want to try the other `ExoPlayer settings` switches, too.

## :warning: Known issues/regressions which are not fixed with this update :warning:

**DO NOT OPEN NEW ISSUES FOR THEM BUT FOLLOW THE LINKED ONES INSTEAD!**

- [YouTube] No streams are returned in some playlists: YouTube returns an unsupported UI by the extractor when there are only shorts in a playlists: see TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1077 more details.
- Player notification actions set from app player notification settings are not used on Android 13 and above: this is related to targeting Android 13/API 33 or higher: apps cannot completely personalize media notifications: see #9764 for more details.

## Changelog

This version also includes the changes from [NewPipe Extractor version v0.22.7](https://github.com/TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor/releases/tag/v0.22.7).

### New
- Allow setting volume and brightness gestures on any side of the screen #9708
- Add an ExoPlayer settings page #8875 #10122
- Add support for multiple audio tracks #9937 #10230
- Add support for displaying main-tabs at the bottom of the screen #9719

### Improved
- Add whitelist to only retrieve supported YouTube itags/streams #9748
- [YouTube] Improve download speed #9948
- [PeerTube] Handle links to the instance ‚Äúpeertube.stream‚Äù #10141
- Fix a memory leak in the player #10232
- Disable media tunneling by default on more known unsupported devices #10122

### Fixed
- [PeerTube] Fix uploader and subchannel avatars being swapped and disable loading thumbnail message failure on content details page #10066
- Fix crash after feed update #10229
- Fix no video in player when switching to main player from playlist view #10195

### Localization
- Update translations #10074
- Add new language ﬂíﬂûﬂè / N'Ko (nqo) to the language chooser  #10042
- Translate README into new languages and update a few translations #9421 #9897 #10240 #10250
- Add Uchinaguchi translation #10250

### Development
- Remove jsoup files from APK #10004
- Update to Kotlin to 1.8.20 and AndroidX Core to 1.10 and switch to AndroidX's `PendingIntentCompat` #10021
- Upgrade Gradle and AGP from 7.x to 8.x and use Java 17 #10035 #10067
- Update ACRA to 5.10.1 and Checkstyle to 10.12.1 to fix a dependency vulnerability #10200
- Update screenshots #10213
- Add support for new GitHub assets URLs in image minimizer workflow & minimize images in PR descriptions #10166 #10233
- Add link to wiki page for APK download #10219
- Clean up `AlertDialog`s #10223
- Update LeakCanary library #10085 #10232
- Add database test for `SubscriptionManager` #8456
- Update AndroidX Room library #10235
- Use Okio 3.4.0 explicitly to fix a vulnerability #10281

author: QuantumBadger
name: RedReader
changeLog:
* Fix for permission denied errors on videos due to Reddit API change
* Show self text for link posts (thanks to Cameron Merkel)
* Announce self-text presence with link posts in screen readers (thanks to Cameron Merkel)
* Add more specific error messages for blocked, quarantined, and premium-only subreddits (thanks to Cameron Merkel)
* Add option to disable user avatars (thanks to Cameron Merkel)
* Upgraded video player to fix issues with slow playback

author: home-assistant
name: Home Assistant
changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Add Android 14 device controls panel by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3855
* Prevent GeofencingRequest exception on no zones by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3857
* Don't force on/yes/y/off/no/n to booleans for service button by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3858
* Only use the base URL during onboarding if the URL is Nabu Casa by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3322
* Thread debug log: make extended PAN ID more readable by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3868
* Add camera tile to Wear OS by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3870
* Update Fastlane by @JBassett in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3874
* Automatically fix broken registrations/webhooks by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3875
* Add smooth scrolling for rotary input by @Dubzer in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3876
* Bump org.jlleitschuh.gradle.ktlint from 11.5.1 to 11.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3877
* Fix isActive for locks by @aronsky in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3862
* Fix rotary input after first screen & for picker by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3881
* Update change log week of 9/22 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3885
* Bump actions/setup-java from 3.12.0 to 3.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3882
* Add troubleshooting tool: location history by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3886
* Update icon by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3888
* ListHeader: fix text cut off by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3898
* Add missing scroll bar to remaining screens by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3895
* Update Wear more details screen to prevent cut off by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3899
* Bump io.sentry:sentry-android from 6.29.0 to 6.30.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3900
* Update change log week of 9/29 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3901
* Switch to Wear Device specific preview by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3906
* Use recommended splash screen library for Wear OS by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3908
* Update gradle to 8.3 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3903
* Add NFC state sensor by @marazmarci in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3905
* Begin migrating Wear OS components to Material 3 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3904
* Bump hilt from 2.48 to 2.48.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3911
* Bump org.altbeacon:android-beacon-library from 2.19.6 to 2.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3915
* Update manual onboarding screens to prevent the button from overlapping elements by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3909
* Update 'Chip' and 'ToggleChip' to 'Button' and 'ToggleButton' except for 'WearToggleChip' by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3917
* Fix Picker rotary input on some devices and update design by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3919
* Shorten some settings strings by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3921
* Fix detail pane after material 3 migration, add additional previews by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3920
* Change log week of 10/6 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3922
* Update entity button with toggle styling to match M3 components by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3923
* Fix icon button sizes by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3918

## New Contributors
* @aronsky made their first contribution in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/3862

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/home-assistant/android/compare/2023.9.2...2023.10.2
